mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM -1 AS ROWNUM, ta.b_id as bId, ta.b_title as bTitle, ta.b_content as bContent, ta.b_writer as bWriter FROM lc_board ta, (SELECT @ROWNUM := (SELECT COUNT(*) - #{pageNum} + 1 FROM lc_board ta)) tb LIMIT #{pageNum}, 3
SELECT b_id bId, b_title bTitle, b_content bContent, b_writer bWriter, b_datetime bDateTime FROM lc_board WHERE b_id = #{bId}
